Package org.jboss.soa.esb.services.security

Interface Summary
PasswordHandler Interface for password handlers
PasswordPlugin Interface for password plugins
SecurityService This interface represents a Security service.
 

Class Summary
FilePasswordPlugin Password plugin supporting FilePlugin.
PasswordPluginManager Manage password plugin functionality.
PasswordUtil Util class that can read a password from a specified file.
SecurityConfig This class is indended to security related configuration properties.
SecurityConfig.Builder  
SecurityConfigUtil This util class provides methods to extract information from a security configuration.
SecurityContext Security Context contains security related information.
SecurityServiceFactory  
 

Enum Summary
PublicCryptoUtil Util for encrypting/decrypting using assymmetric keys.
 

Exception Summary
SecurityServiceException Exception for SecurityServices.
